mosinstall.description: JLogger is the log viewer component of the JLogger interface. It also doubles to install the relevant database tables.

queries.query: CREATE TABLE `#__jlogger_entries` ( `logid` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `application` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `type` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'message', `priority` ENUM('panic', 'emerg', 'alert', 'crit', 'err', 'error', 'warn', 'warning', 'notice', 'info', 'debug', 'none') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'info', `entrydate` DATETIME, `message` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY(`logid`) ) COMMENT = 'JLogger Log Table';
